message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's in excellent condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,500. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your offer. However,  $9,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $10,250? This price still leaves some room for negotiation but is closer to what I'm hoping for.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort, but I am still not able to meet at $10,250. My maximum budget remains at $9,500. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
